meanings.definition: The yearly recurrence of the date of a past event.
meanings.sent1: Our anniversary is a special day we celebrate each year.
meanings.sent2: They had a lovely dinner to mark their anniversary.
meanings.sent3: For their anniversary, they decided to recreate their first date.
meanings.sent4: The anniversary of their friendship was a time for reflection.
meanings.sent5: The anniversary of the moon landing is a historic moment.

meanings.definition: A date that follows a certain number of years after an event.
meanings.sent1: The couple's anniversary is in June.
meanings.sent2: The company celebrated its 50th anniversary with a big party.
meanings.sent3: His work anniversary is a reminder of how far he has come.
meanings.sent4: The anniversary of her graduation brought back memories.
meanings.sent5: The anniversary of the invention of the telephone changed communication forever.
